parameters.name: AclName
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform. Set the value to **CreateAccessControlList**.

parameters.name: AddressIPVersion
parameters.description: The ID of the region where you want to create the ACL.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The name of the ACL. The name must be 1 to 80 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), forward slashes (/), and underscores (\_). The name of the ACL that you create must be unique within each region.
